name: Neovim
description: A feature to install Neovim from source or apt and your own dotfiles

mode.description: The installation mode. Use 'auto' to try to use 'apt' to match the required version or as fallback 'source'. Use 'apt' to install the latest version using 'apt'. Use 'source' to install the required version using the source repositry.

repository.description: The public github repository of Neovim to be installed

version.description: The version of Neovim to be installed (nightly, latest (Alias for stable), stable or a specific version in the format 'MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH' e.g. '0.10.1' or 'v0.10.1' or '0.10' or '0')

config.description: The neovim config file that should be used. This to be a public github repository.

config_hook.description: Enable to run the `.neovim_devcontainer_hook.sh` inside of your config folder on install if exists.

nerdfont.description: Enable to install the JetBrainsMono NerdFont. May required by your `config`.

lazygit.description: Enable to install the LazyGit. May required by your `config`.
